title: Citi CEO Pandit Discusses Banking Basics, Eurozone and More
summary: During his recent trip to Asia Pacific, Citi CEO Vikram Pandit appeared on Australia's "Inside Business" to discuss issues that included responsible finance, getting back to banking basics, the Eurozone and serving clients. Watch the interview in full, here.
